mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (contract_name, subcontractor_name, item_code, supply_price, agreement_date, leadtime, contract_file, contract_text) VALUES (#{ contract_name }, #{ subcontractor_name }, #{ item_code }, #{ supply_price }, #{ agreement_date }, #{ leadtime }, #{ contract_file }, #{ contract_text })
